item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (571 points | 156 comments)
2. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (223 points | 89 comments)
3. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (311 points | 316 comments)
4. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (4 points | 1 comment)
5. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (76 points | 35 comments)
6. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (24 points | 9 comments)
7. Sutton and Barto Book Implementation (5 points | discuss)
8. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (27 points | 5 comments)
9. The curse of knowing how, or; fixing everything (906 points | 383 comments)
10. Continue (YC S23) is hiring software engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)
11. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (164 points | 79 comments)
12. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (81 points | 38 comments)
13. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (200 points | 65 comments)
14. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (57 points | 11 comments)
15. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (136 points | 16 comments)
16. Sneakers (1992) – 4K makeover sourced from the original camera negative (356 points | 248 comments)
17. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (59 points | 39 comments)
18. Understanding effective type Aliasing in C [pdf] (17 points | discuss)
19. Show HN: Feedsmith — Fast parser & generator for RSS, Atom, OPML feed namespaces (36 points | 4 comments)
20. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (440 points | 422 comments)
21. TeleMessage, used by Trump officials, can access plaintext chat logs (140 points | 30 comments)
22. New studies offer insight into Lyme disease’s treatment, lingering symptoms (150 points | 78 comments)
23. iOS Kindle app now has a ‘get book’ button after changes to App Store rules (104 points | 96 comments)
24. Design and evaluation of a parrot-to-parrot video-calling system (2023) (123 points | 63 comments)
25. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (261 points | 206 comments)
26. Scientists discover new way to convert corn waste to low-cost sugar for biofuel (27 points | 7 comments)
27. MTerrain: Optimized terrain system and editor for Godot (64 points | 5 comments)
28. The Inchtuthil Nail Hoard (63 points | 18 comments)
29. Propositions as Types (2014) [pdf] (93 points | 49 comments)
30. Curl: We still have not seen a valid security report done with AI help (332 points | 172 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
